delete.summary: Deletes school customized regular (day of week) availability

get.summary: Gets school regular (day of week) availability

put.summary: Saves school regular (day of week) availability

get.summary: Gets school availability for a date
get.description:
If DateAvailability record does not exist will return regular availability for day of week
of specified date

get.summary: Gets default availability for specified tourDuration
Calls log statements for each log level

parameters.name: StartDateTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets optional start UTC date and time query filter

parameters.name: EndDateTime
parameters.description: Gets or sets optional end UTC date and time query filter

startTime.description: Gets or sets start time of availability block

endTime.description: Gets or sets end time of availability block

startTime.description: Gets or sets start time of availability block

endTime.description: Gets or sets end time of availability block

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of tour

endDateTime.description: Ending date and time of tour

tourTypes.description:
An aggregation over Goddard.ToursWebApi.Dtos.ScheduleItemTourTypeDto.SlotsAvailable 
and Goddard.ToursWebApi.Dtos.ScheduleItemTourTypeDto.AttendeeCount, per TourType

slotsAvailable.description: Available slots for schedule (by default -1 to denote unlimited slots)

ScheduleItemTourTypeDto.description: DTO for info per tour type on a Goddard.ToursWebApi.Dtos.ScheduleItemDto

startDateTime.description: Tour start UTC date and time

endDateTime.description: Tour end UTC date and time

guideId.description: Faculty ID of guide assigned to this tour

cancellationReasonId.description: Cancellation reason ID of this tour

viewed.description: Date in UTC when the user viewed tour's details in FBP
